    name="jwt1_users",
    refresh=True,
    roles=[
        "user"
    ],
    rules={
        "all": [
            {
                "field": {
                    "realm.name": "jwt1"
                }
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "username": "principalname1"
                }
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "dn": "CN=Principal Name 1,DC=example.com"
                }
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "groups": "group1"
                }
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "metadata.jwt_claim_other": "other1"
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    enabled=True,
)
